name: nativescript-version-tracking
description: Track which versions of your NativeScript App a user has previously installed.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-version-tracking && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
